name: Slavic Demons - Baba Yaga
description:
Boruta, Headmaster of the Polish section of Hell is managing a department of Slavic demons along with his partner, Rokita. One day during inspection of prison cells they discovered a powerful Slavic beauty, Baba Yaga escaped, and now to avoid potential sanctions they decide to retrieve her back...

This project is just a cinematic for RPG maker event - Let's Make a Scene: Sounds of Harmony Contest!

Check also my other game, Spellzone
